hero.title: One Missed Call to Transform a Life
hero.subtitle: Empowering rural women entrepreneurs through technology that works without smartphones or internet. Building communities and changing lives.

features.sectionSubtitle: Technology that empowers, connects, and grows with you.

missedCall.title: Missed Call Registration
missedCall.description: Register your business with just one missed call. Our AI-powered IVR system guides you through simple steps in English and Hindi.

blockchain.title: Blockchain Payments
blockchain.description: Secure, transparent transactions without middlemen. Withdraw earnings easily at any NEKTECH hub in your community.

aiTraining.title: AI-powered Training
aiTraining.description: Receive weekly business tips and training via voice calls and WhatsApp messages. Learn and grow at your own pace.

marketplace.title: Marketplace Access
marketplace.description: Sell your products globally through our marketplace. We connect you to platforms like Amazon Saheli and Flipkart Samarth.

missedCallFeature.title: One Missed Call is All You Need
missedCallFeature.description: Our AI-powered Interactive Voice Response (IVR) system makes business registration accessible to anyone with a basic phone. No smartphone or internet required.

demo.title: IVR Registration Demo
demo.subtitle: Experience our registration process
demo.step2: We call back and ask: "Press 1 for English, 2 for Hindi"
demo.step3: Enter your basic information using phone keypad
demo.step4: Your business is registered! You'll receive a confirmation call.

blockchainFeature.title: Blockchain-Powered Payments
blockchainFeature.description: Our blockchain technology ensures your transactions are secure, transparent, and affordable. No middlemen means more profit stays in your pocket.

noHiddenFees.title: No Hidden Fees
noHiddenFees.description: Transparent pricing with minimal transaction costs

easyWithdrawal.title: Easy Cash Withdrawal
easyWithdrawal.description: Visit any NEKTECH hub in your community

secureTransaction.title: Secure Transaction
secureTransaction.description: Customer payment is securely processed on blockchain

easyWithdrawal.title: Easy Withdrawal
easyWithdrawal.description: Visit any NEKTECH hub to collect cash

aiTraining.title: AI-Powered Training
aiTraining.description: Receive personalized business training through voice calls and WhatsApp messages. Learn essential skills at your own pace, in your preferred language.

ivr.title: Sample Training Call
ivr.placeholder: Your personalized training content will appear here. Select a topic and generate!

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Tutorial
whatsapp.placeholder: Your personalized WhatsApp training content will appear here. Select a topic and generate!

authRequired.title: Authentication Required
authRequired.description: Please sign in to generate training content.

contentGenerated.title: Training Content Generated
contentGenerated.description: Your personalized training content is ready!

error.title: Error
error.description: Sorry, we couldn't generate training content. Please try again later.

marketplace.title: NEKTECH Marketplace
marketplace.subtitle: Connect with customers worldwide and access major e-commerce platforms through our marketplace and community hubs.

hubsMap.mapDisplay: Our hub locations will be displayed here using OpenStreetMap

partners.title: Partner Platforms
partners.subtitle: We connect your products to leading e-commerce marketplaces

footer.tagline: Empowering rural women entrepreneurs through technology that works for everyone.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for updates on our initiatives and success stories.
